CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 26, 1959, pg. 1, reads: "One Dies, One Overcome - Mrs. Ora Lee Suber, landlady who lives on the first floor at 1401 Liverpool St., looks at all that's left of a burned couch in third-floor living room apartment of the family of Mrs. Hattie Harris, who was hospitalized for smoke inhalation after fire on Sunday burned to a crisp the body of James Banner, 1822 Charles St. (inset) a visitor in Mrs. Harris' third-floor home. Banner was asleep on the couch and could not escape. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Burned living room of Hattie Harris' apartment, 1401 Liverpool Street, Manchester
